name: The Unbreakable Oni Slaying Bear
description:
You are a Bear that has come in contact with an Oni, one who may have answers to the whereabouts of your beloved,

This game was made by: Brandon Correa

use "a" and "d" to move left and right

Press the "space bar" to attack with your sword

This game was referenced from Jonathan Da Roza

https://www.openprocessing.org/sketch/463310

The games rain animation was used from The Coding Train at
